tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had an issue with my jaw, when the doctor diagnosed an issue with my bite and recommended braces. Dr Amar was always available to clear doubts and in fact I once called him at 12 midnight as one of the wire was hurting my gum, he very patiently resolved the issue on call and was even ready to come to the clinic in case I would have failed to help myself. Such dedication in practice is rare and I truly thank him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: TMJ Pain Management,Ceramic Self Ligating Braces,
review: I cannot recommend Dr. Amar Ravjiani enough! I came in with severe TMJ pain, and after an in-depth consultation, Dr. Ravjiani designed a treatment plan that worked wonders. The TMJ issue was resolved effectively, and the relief was incredible. Following this, I underwent braces procedure to correct my alignment. Dr. Ravjiani guided me through the entire process with great expertise and patience. The results are fantastic, and I feel so much better. The clinic staff is also very friendly and accommodating. For anyone dealing with TMJ issues or considering braces, Dr. Amar Ravjiani is the best choice!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We went to Dr Amar for my daughter’s braces treatment and we had an amazing experience. 
The clinic is also very neat and clean and  friendly and helpful staff too. I would definitely recommend anyone looking for dental treatment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Swati is always approachable even when called her on her mobile during any time. 
Me staying in pune she is alway  helping. 
She makes the patient feel comfortable and so the treatment is always happy.

tags: None
review:
Having Been Diagnosed with 
Temporomandibular Joint Disorder, I was In Extreme Pain And Could Barely Open My Mouth. After Going to more than 10  Specialized dentist's who had absolutely No Idea about my Cure, My Pain & Suffering Came to an End when I came to Know About Dr.Amar. ******* *** ***** ** ** *** **** *** ****** ** ***** *** ********* ***** *** ******** *** *** ****** ** ******* ********* ***** *** ******* ** ********* ******* ** ********* ****** ******** *** ** ********* ************* He is very professional yet very friendly at the same time. He always expresses concern and asks if I am doing okay during the visit. He is very timely and Always gives explanations of the work He is doing. The Best Part About Him is, He is always Calm and Composed. Under His Great line of Treatment, I finally Have recovered Completely with that Beautiful smile of Mine. Dr.Amar's Clinic Has the most Advanced Dental Equipments. 
I wish to express my extreme gratitude to Dr.Amar for my recent dental experience. Dr.Amar has not only reinvented my smile, He has enhanced my self-esteem and confidence to a level I thought to be unobtainable. Just a short note to thank you so much for your kindness and consideration towards me. You’re a “special” guy and a terrific dentist! Thanks again.

review: Doctor Uncle Has Been One Gem Of A Person Ive Been Visiting Since I Was In 6th Std Till Date Let It Be Wisdom Tooth Removal , Teeth Cleaning , Braces, Alignment, You Can Trust Him With Eyes Closed, The Atmosphere In The Clinic Is Like Family And All Ailments Are Well Treated

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The treatment provided by Dr Ravjiani went very smoothly, with zero problems. Dr Ravjiani explained the course of action very well and guided me to ensure that the Invisalign treatment worked successfully.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had my first meeting with Dr. Amar Ravijani back in 2016 when I faced significant underbite and facial aesthetic issue.  He had patiently explained the problem in depth and its solution in a way my family members understood. I first went through an orthodontic procedure to correct my teeth positioning which took quite some time. The positioning came right by 2022 when he referred me to Dr Chintamani Kelkar who would be handling my surgery (maxillary osteotomy). The two doctors had great cooperation and kept me engaged in the process descriptions. The post-surgery consultation with Dr. Ravijani and Dr. Kelkar was very helpful with regards to my swelling and post-surgery jaw structure. It’s now been 1 year since the surgery and I feel confident with my facial aesthetic as well as the ability to eat better. Thank you so much Dr. Amar for this cooperation and consistency.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is well versed in his area of service. When I visited first time I had an issue of night grinding. Instead of straight away going to route of night guard or telling me to number of stuff. He just told me to CT scan.

He then took his time to identify actual cause. After identifying cause he sat with me and my wife and explained problem and its solution. He patiently answered all our queries. 

I stay in USA so I am always in time crunch when I visit India. He is very flexible in terms of appointment schedule. He is very friendly and don't bother me calling him at anytime for my queries.

Overall I am very happy with my decision of visiting him for my problem and would definitely recommend him for any services related to Orthodontic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My 11 year old son had completely protruding teeth three years ago. But today thanks to Dr Amar his teeth are all well aligned and in good shape. Dr Amar’s study of  my sons teeth and jawline and his explanation of the entire process was extremely impressive and easy for us to understand.  He is always a phone call away and has attended to all our emergencies even during covid.  At his clinic the staff is extremely friendly and helpful with the appointments.  Thank you doc … *** *** *** *******

review:
It was an awesome experience to be treated ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ****** After visiting several dental clinics in Andheri, Bandra, Juhu finally I found the perfect place(Jaw n Joints) where I wanted to start my treatment. Dr Amar is a visionary and excellent in everything he does with utmost care and professionalism. Getting an appointment is very easy.
During Covid times they have maintained all the necessary precautions ( temperature checks, pulse check and proper sanitization). Last but not the least thank you for making my smile perfect. *** **** *** *** *** ***** Highly recommend this place to everyone in search of ortho treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr amar has given me new life.he diagnosed temporomandibular dysfunction as a cause of my headache and successfully treated it.my headache of  more than 5 years whose cause could not be diagnosed by various doctors including neurologists  was treated by Dr amar.
                     I am from jammu , I took upon myself to find cause of my headache when it continued despite multiple medications from different doctors, it's during my internet search that I came to know about TMJ  disorder as one of the cause of headache . THEN came the task of finding TMJ disorder specialist and here also google helped me. I flew down to mumbai for consultation with Dr amar and his treatment relieved me from headache.
                Thanks Dr amar,
 a excellent doctor and a wonderful human being.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
ever since i was 8 my parents knew i needed braces. the alignment was not good and they had to be pushed inside. 
finally after recommendations we found jaws-n-joints. Dr. Amar definitely has done a really great job. Any difficulty you can directly inform him and he will make sure it is taken care of. i am really impressed by the result! my smile is much better and the teeth are well aligned all thanks to his treatment! his work is very fine and give you his best! very much satisfied and happy with the result 👏🏻👏🏻

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was an amazing experience to be treated by one of the most reputed doctors in India. I would say that he is probably the best dentist in Mumbai. If you're looking for any sort of corrections, a perfect jawline or just the perfect smile, you can consult him without any second thoughts! He treated me in a year with his expertise. I must say that he is very particular and professional with his work. The team is working in and out with him to deliver the best service to the clients using world class facilities at the same time. My entire family has got treatments done from him, and they are all just overawed with the final result. Truly appreciate your time and efforts sir. It was so easy and convenient to get through this. Hope to see you soon. Take care! 
Best, Yash.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
A year and a half back, I was diagnosed with TMJ disorder. Before that, no doctor understood or knew my suffering. Things like: Pain in my jaw, pain around my ear, difficulty in chewing, pain while chewing, difficulty in opening or closing my mouth, click sound while opening or closing my mouth and frequent headache, were common for me. Then an aunt of mine who's a dentist recommended Dr. Amar Ravjiani for my treatment. The way he understood my problems and explained me what I was going through, cleared my doubts on trusting somebody who would completely cure me of such a rare and unknown disorder. My treatment is currently ongoing, but have experienced a lot of difference in my jaw and its movement. Being a foodie, I can now chew my favourite delicacies without a thought. ;) 
For now, waiting to have it cured completely and live life pain free.
Thank you soooo much Dr. Amar :)

tags: None
review:
For over two years i have been suffering from severe headaches.i consulted various specialist doctors in mumbai but it didn't help as the real problem was not diagnosed.

During my own research on the net,i saw Dr Amar's profile on practo and took an appointment.

Dr Amar heard my problem and went through my reports.I was very impressed at our very first meeting when he told me with confidence that he knew what the problem was and that he will be able to help.
The way he explained about the problem, it's reason and the treatment plan,not many doctors do.I started his treatment immediately and true to his word in two weeks the results started showing.My headaches are now almost gone.

I am very thankful to Dr Amar who diagnosed me with TMJ and made a treatment plan for me.I can never thank him enough.i wish him all the best and wish he helps many more just like me. A highly recommended doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: my treatment with Dr.Amar went on for 4 years and I went to him for fixing my braces since my teeth were not straight. I had a really good experience with him because firstly he gave really good explanation for the issue and throughout the whole process he was very supportive and was always happy to answer my questions. Overall, he was really supportive and helpful and I felt very comfortable with him because the way he explained everything helped me understand that he knew what he was doing and my experience would be really good and will go smoothly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have crowded teeth susceptible to cavities, and had to undergone 5 root canals in previous 7 years.  So when it came to the question of correcting the teeth, straightening them I approached multiple people for their experience and couple of friends and relatives strongly suggested Amar Ravjiani.

I visited the dentist for initial consultation and he was extremely patient, and explained me in detail the various options available, pros and cons, expected outcomes, time required without any bias towards any kind of treatment.

I settled for invisible braces and the prognosis has been as expected as seen in computer simulation.  During the course of the treatment there was a time when my teeth were not tracking, he worked with me to get new set of braces from Invisalign increasing the numbers of braces, to suit my requirement.

I am really very happy with the outcome. Amar in my opinion is a great professional and I would highly recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: For anyone with TMJ, I highly recommend this clinic.  I have TMJ and was experiencing constant pain in my jaw for several years. Dr. Amar Ravjiani recommended I wear a splint on my teeth at night, as this will allow my joint to relax and my jaw will move into a better position. I felt almost instant pain relief after wearing the splint. The doctor made adjustments on my splint each month, and he was very attentive and thorough during this process, making sure it was adjusted perfectly. He is very confident of his method’s ability to help his patients. I am very satisfied with the results. I also appreciate that the doctor took the time to explain in detail what the issue was and what steps we need to take to fix it.  It gave me some confidence moving forward about a situation I was confused about for so long. The doctor is very patient, thorough, and experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was under treatment with Dr. Amar Ravjiani since last 4 years. I had my braces on all the time and after numerous hurdles, he somehow still managed to transform my teeth from a total mess to absolute perfection. I had a very complicated case, I have underdeveloped cheekbones but Dr. Amar did his absolute best and gave me a smile that I am very much proud of! He also recommended an amazing Maxillofacial surgeon, Dr. C. V. Kelkar, for my Dental implants and always accompanied me to my trips there. I can never imagine any other Doctor supporting a patient so much. Dr. Amar Ravjiani is an amazing human being and an absolute magician. It's been a pleasure undergoing treatment with you and I highly recommend him to anyone who wants to get their teeth done. Thank You. Best regards, Ameya G. Sakpal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Before entry, great care was taken by checking body temperature, sanitising hands, etc. This built up the comfort level immediately.

Since service was with pre-appointment only, there was no waiting time.

Antiseptic mouth wash was given before entering the doctors room.

Dr Amar had a friendly approach (I have been to him 8-10 times for 3 different dental jobs over past 2 years and the experience was same, if not better)

Two of my past jobs are not giving me any problem. Dr Amar makes it a pount to ask me each time about my comfort with past dental jobs, which is very reassuring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are a family from France/Italy and were looking specifically for a jaws specialist.  This is not so common in Mumbai and it was such a relief to find the expertise of Dr Ravjiani.
Our daughter had pain when chewing and couldn’t actually open her mouth fully. She also suffered from frequent headaches. Dr Ravjiani was very detailed and patient in explaining the splint treatment. Over time we could see very clear improvement. Her headaches and pain disappeared and she can now bite in an apple. The treatment was really efficient. We strongly recommend Dr Ravjiani for his professionalism and kindness. We appreciated that he never pushed to do unnecessary treatment. His clinic is extremely clean and we always felt re-assured by his competency

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi Guys,
I am doing my TMJ and Teeth alignment at Doctor Amarji clinic's. I surely recommend him for good service, the way he explains the issues and everything in details in advance at every appointment get you through to your problem model and advise you the best service and treatment out of available providers.

I find him very friendly and caring towards patient and give your such a treatment that you wont feel single pinch of pain while treatment.

The cost is also competitive to market other service provider and Staff is good and coordinative. You will get everything in one umbrella since His wife is also Family Dental doctor who is also same caring person.

Must visit to avail a better treatment at very fairly price and avail good out off.  

Value for Money!!!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Amar is a very straight forward and down to earth person. One can approach him at any time without hesitation. Your child feels comfortable and can be very friendly as he is a very sweet person.
Firstly he will always guide and explain you the procedures to be done / followed prior commencement of treatment.
He will always recommend the best option for the child depending on the case.

I have also done my treatment from him and because of which I wanted my daughter too to get her treatment done from him inspite of being slightly far from my place.

I will recommend him to any of my friends or relatives as he is worth doing so.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: TMJ disorder led me slip into partial depression. Doctor's calm nature and assurance regarding my treatment gave me a lot of confidence to go ahead with my treatment.  On Splint therapy currently from past few months and I have already seen a tremendous amount of improvement in my mouth opening. I would highly recommend Dr. Amar for his excellent skill of managing TMJ disorder with such an ease.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr.Amar has helped me resolve the issue my Bite Correction. I Was having issues with pain near my ears, head, etc. Had consulted many doctors who said it could be an issue with TM joint but that was not the case. Once I got in touch with Dr.Amar he suggested the issue was with the bite and it had to be corrected.It is a long process via which I am more then half way on the path to recovery. Many thanks to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was searching for a good orthodontist for a very long time and my search ended at this amazing clinic. I was under Dr Amar's treatment for the past 2 and ½ years. During my time with braces and all through my treatment he was very supportive and was always a call away for any issues. I'm usually scared of dental procedures but he and his whole staff were very friendly. I'm extremely happy with my smile now. Would definitely recommend him for any dental consultation and treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

review:

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent and very professionally done treatment to an 90 plus years old lady. New denture prepared and fitted within 3 sittings . Liked the positive and courteous attitude of the Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ravijiani was very thorough and diligent with establishing that I had a TMJ issue when I walked in to his office asking for help with a "pain near my ear". He immediately suggested a CT scan, which corroborated his diagnosis of the TMJ issue, following which he made a detailed PowerPoint deck to present the issue with pictures and videos of my biting and side face. He then ordered a splint to be made urgently since I was leaving to go back to the US in a couple of days, which provided instant relief for the pain. Now, we are moving to the therapeutic part of it, correcting my bite. We will be getting a digital scan for Invisalign. Truly very happy with the help and have seen TMJ specialists in chicago, still come back to Dr. Ravijiani.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a great experience with Dr. Swati Ravjiani and the team. A team of experienced and really friendly doctors who make the patient feel so comfortable during the whole process. The procedure of the root canal was also carried out so easily without any discomfort. Dr. Swati ensured that I was okay at every stop of the procedure and made it much easier for me. It turned out to be an experience that I was really scared about to an experience that went so well that I am not afraid of any dental procedures anymore.
Vicky Pandit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: At1st I was charged for teeth  measurements which was like 5000 then I was told to take the splint which was cost 30000 *** ***** ******* ** **** *********** *** **** *** I paid 5000 and for the splint ** **** ******** **** **** ** **** I was given quote of 30000 doctor is okay but the fees are not okay at all only recommended if you wanna pay double the amount
reply_text: Our fees are based totally on the expertise and experience involved. Measurements are taken not only for fabrication of splint but for actual diagnosis of the problem. Entire treatment plan based on diagnosis is explained to the patient. Our splints are customised to achieve treatment goals and they work on many areas solving issues of the Jaw position, TMJ disorders, muscles and teeth.
